markdown:
| icon           = poe2 infested_koiki icon.png
| description    = This koīki fruit looks a day past its prime, but still edible. Holding it to the light reveals a darker truth - the seeds under the skin possess tiny legs, wings, and vicious pincers. The infestation seem dormant for now, but it's anyone's guess what could happen after an incautious bite.
